languages.text: "Кассия способна умертвить свой Дом по велению мысли. Что станет с Монолитом, если души всех навигаторов разом покинут свои тела?"

traits.locale_text: "Кассия способна умертвить свой дом по велению мысли. Что станет с камнем, если души всех Навигаторов разом покинут свои тела?"

languages.text: "Cassia can bring death to her entire House with but a thought. What would become of the Monolith if the souls of the Orsellio Navigators were to leave their bodies all at once?"
languages.original_text: "Кассия способна умертвить свой Дом по велению мысли. Что станет с Монолитом, если души всех навигаторов разом покинут свои тела?"

traits.locale_text: "Cassia can bring death to her entire House with but a thought. What would become of the Monolith if the souls of the Orsellio Navigators were to leave their bodies all at once?"
"Cassia can bring death to her entire House with but a thought. What would become of the Monolith if the souls of the Orsellio Navigators were to leave their bodies all at once?"
"Cassia can bring death to her entire House with but a thought. What would become of the Monolith if the souls of the Orsellio Navigators were to leave their bodies all at once?"
"Cassia can bring death to her entire House with but a thought. What would become of the Monolith if the souls of the Orsellio Navigators were to leave their bodies all at once?"
"Cassia can bring death to her entire House with but a thought. What would become of the Monolith if the souls of the Orsellio Navigators were to leave their bodies all at once?"
"Cassia can bring death to her entire House with but a thought. What would become of the Monolith if the souls of the Orsellio Navigators were to leave their bodies all at once?"

languages.text: 「カシアの一存でオーセリオ家を丸ごと死に至らしめることができる。オーセリオの航宙士の魂がその身から一斉に抜ければ、モノリスはどうなる？」
languages.original_text: "Cassia can bring death to her entire House with but a thought. What would become of the Monolith if the souls of the Orsellio Navigators were to leave their bodies all at once?"

traits.locale_text: 「カシアの一存でオーセリオ家を丸ごと死に至らしめることができる。オーセリオの航宙士の魂がその身から一斉に抜ければ、モノリスはどうなる？」

languages.text: “卡西娅只要一个念头，就可以让整个家族所有人丧命。如果她把奥赛罗家族所有导航者的灵魂同时剥离出来，你们的灵魂石会变成什么样子？”
languages.original_text: "Cassia can bring death to her entire House with but a thought. What would become of the Monolith if the souls of the Orsellio Navigators were to leave their bodies all at once?"

traits.locale_text: “卡西娅只要一个念头，就可以让整个家族所有人丧命。如果她把奥塞罗家族所有导航者的灵魂同时剥离出来，你们的灵魂石会变成什么样子？”

languages.text: « Cassia peut, d'une simple pensée, provoquer la mort de toute sa maison. Que deviendra le Monolithe si toutes les âmes des navigateurs Orsellio quittent leur corps en même temps ? »
languages.original_text: "Cassia can bring death to her entire House with but a thought. What would become of the Monolith if the souls of the Orsellio Navigators were to leave their bodies all at once?"

traits.locale_text: « Cassia peut, d'une simple pensée, provoquer la mort de toute sa maison. Que deviendra le Monolithe si toutes les âmes des navigateurs Orsellio quittent leur corps en même temps ? »

languages.text: «Cassia puede poner fin a toda su casa con un solo pensamiento. ¿Qué sería del Monolito si las almas de todos los Navegantes Orsellio abandonaran sus cuerpos al mismo tiempo?».
languages.original_text: "Cassia can bring death to her entire House with but a thought. What would become of the Monolith if the souls of the Orsellio Navigators were to leave their bodies all at once?"

traits.locale_text: «Cassia puede poner fin a toda su casa con un solo pensamiento. ¿Qué sería del Monolito si las almas de todos los Navegantes Orsellio abandonaran sus cuerpos al mismo tiempo?».

languages.text: "Cassia kann mit einem einzigen Gedanken ihrem ganzen Haus den Tod bringen. Was würde aus dem Monolithen werden, wenn die Seelen der Orsellio-Navigatoren ihre Körper alle gleichzeitig verlassen würden?"
languages.original_text: "Cassia can bring death to her entire House with but a thought. What would become of the Monolith if the souls of the Orsellio Navigators were to leave their bodies all at once?"

traits.locale_text: "Cassia kann mit einem einzigen Gedanken ihrem ganzen Haus den Tod bringen. Was würde aus dem Monolithen werden, wenn die Seelen der Orsellio-Navigatoren ihre Körper alle gleichzeitig verlassen würden?"

languages.text: "Cassia, yalnızca bunu aklından geçirerek tüm Hanesini ölüme boğabilir. Tüm Orsellio Rotacılarının ruhları tek seferde vücutlarından ayrılsa Monolit'in hâli ne olur?"
languages.original_text: "Cassia can bring death to her entire House with but a thought. What would become of the Monolith if the souls of the Orsellio Navigators were to leave their bodies all at once?"

traits.locale_text: "Cassia'nın tüm Hanesini ölüme boğması için tek bir düşüncesi yeter. Tüm Orsellio Rotacılarının ruhları tek seferde vücutlarından ayrılsa, Monolit'in hâli ne olur?"
